title: Google Cloud Service
description: Google Cloud Platform is a suite of cloud computing services provided by Google.
descriptionOfFreePlan: Free virtual machine instances, cloud functions and app engine

featuresInfo.limitations: Up to % users, 50 GB of storage and egress

featuresInfo.description: A fully managed, serverless platform for hosting web app
featuresInfo.limitations: 28 hours per day of "F" instances with 1 GB of egress per day

featuresInfo.description: A managed compute platform to run containers
featuresInfo.limitations: 2M requests per month, 360,000 GB-seconds of memory, 180,000 vCPU-seconds of compute time
2M invocations per month, 400,000 GB-seconds, 200,000 GHz-seconds of compute time
One e2-micro instances on certain regions with 30GB standard persistent disk
